AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: Conducted the initial stop of RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle and had an agent present during interviews.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer Police Department: Involved in the traffic stop of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and cooperated with United States Border Patrol.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Government: Bears the burden of proving that stops were constitutional since Defendants were seized without a warrant.
